book.synopsis: A history of aging in America surveys and compares actualities and attitudes in the eighteenth, nineteenth, and twentieth centuries and suggests practical improvements on the current inadequate system of pensions, social security, medicare, and other programs.
book.title_long: Growing Old in America: The Bland-Lee Lectures Delivered at Clark University (Galaxy Books)
